metadata.title: CVE-2020-8631 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: cloud-init through 19.4 relies on Mersenne Twister for a random password, which makes it easier for attackers to predict passwords, because rand_str in cloudinit/util.py calls the random.choice function.

criterions.comment: cloud-init package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
